entry.title: CEPH - A Simple Understanding
entry.summary:
Description

Montréal, QC, September 14, 2015 - Justin Churchill explains how CEPH (a unified, distributed storage system designed for excellent performance, reliability and scalability) differs from legacy storage solutions and what are the top three features of CEPH.

  • About Justin: http://sflx.ca/jchurchill
  • About CEPH: http://ceph.com/

Recorded and edited live by @ChristianAubry at Montréal Python 54 (MP54: Virtualized Utopia) with a little big help from Savoir-faire Linux (http://sflx.ca/jobs).

  • About MP54: http://sflx.ca/MP54e
